00010 /* For FMB_Info.save: */
00011 #define RESULTS_DIR "/tmp/NBODY_direct_results_2963919/"
00012 #define RESULTS_FILE "results_"
00013 
00014 
00015 /*** For timers: ***/
00016 #include <sys/time.h>
00017 double my_gettimeofday(){
00018   struct timeval tmp_time;
00019   gettimeofday(&tmp_time, NULL);
00020   return tmp_time.tv_sec + (tmp_time.tv_usec * 1.0e-6L);
00021 }

00033 /*********************************************************************************************
00034 **********************************************************************************************
00035 
00036    MAIN 
00037 
00038 **********************************************************************************************
00039 *********************************************************************************************/
00040 
00041 int main(int argc, char **argv){
00042 
00043 
00044   long nb_steps = 0;
00045   REAL_T tstart ,tend , tnow ; 
00046   tstart = 0 ; 
00047   tnow = tstart ; 
00048   tend = 0.001 ; 
00049 
00050   char *data_file = NULL;
00051   char *results_file = NULL;
00052   VALUES_T total_potential_energy = 0.0;
00053 
00054   /* Timers: */
00055   double t_start = 0.0, t_end = 0.0;
00056 
00057 
00058   /********************************* Options on command line: ***************************************/
00059   f_output = stdout; /* by default */
00060   parse_command(argc, argv, &data_file, &results_file);
00061   
00062 
00063 
00064 
00065   /******************************** Files and FILE* : ***************************************/
00066   if (INFO_DISPLAY(1)){
00067     fprintf(f_output, 
00068           "*** Compute own interactions of the box defined in \"%s\" ***.\n", 
00069             data_file);
00070   }
00071 
00072 
00073 
00074 
00075 
00076   Direct_method_Init();
00077 
00078 
00079 
00080 
00081 
00082 
00083 
00084   /***************************** Bodies'positions and masses initialization: ****************/
00085   Direct_method_Data(data_file);
00086 
00087   tend=FMB_Info.tend;
00088   if (INFO_DISPLAY(1)){ 
00089     fprintf(f_output, "Start Time : %lf \t End Time : %lf \t dt : %lf \n",tstart, tend, FMB_Info.dt);
00090     fprintf(f_output, "Number of steps: %lu\n", (unsigned long) ((tend-tstart)/FMB_Info.dt));
00091   }
00092  
00093 
00094 
00095 
00096 
00097 
00098 
00099 
00100 
00101   /******************************************************************************************/
00102   /********************************** Start of the simulation: ******************************/
00103   /******************************************************************************************/
00104 
00105   while ( tnow-FMB_Info.dt < tend ) { 
00106 
00107 /********************* Direct method computation: ************************************/
00108 /*********************Direct metho Move : K-D-K **************************************/ 
00109     if(tnow!=0) {
00110 
00111       KnD_Direct_method_Move(FMB_Info.dt ); 
00112       
00113     
00114   /***** Clear the forces and the potential of the bodies for the next time step: ********/
00115     bodies_ClearFP(&bodies);
00116     }
00117 
00118     /* Start timer: */
00119     t_start = my_gettimeofday();
00120 
00121     /* Computation: */
00122     Direct_method_Compute();
00123    
00124     /* End timer: */
00125     t_end = my_gettimeofday();
00126 
00127     if (tnow !=0)K_Direct_method_Move(FMB_Info.dt);
00128 
00129 
00130 
00131 
00132     /****************** Save & display the total time used for this step: *******************/
00133     if (INFO_DISPLAY(1)){
00134       unsigned long long nb_int = NB_OWN_INT(bodies_Nb_bodies(&bodies));
00135        
00136       fprintf(f_output, "\n#######################################################################\n");
00137       fprintf(f_output, "Time now ( Step number) : %lf (%ld) \n",tnow,nb_steps );
00138       fprintf(f_output, "Computation time = %f seconds\n", t_end - t_start);
00139 
00140       fprintf(f_output, "Interactions computed: %llu\n", nb_int);
00141       fprintf(f_output, "  Nb interactions / second: %.3f\n", ((double) nb_int) / (t_end - t_start));
00142 
00143       fprintf(f_output, "  Gflop/s = %.3f (11.5 flop with mutual) \n",
00144               ((((double) nb_int) / (t_end - t_start)) * 11.5 /* 23 flops divided by 2 since mutual */) / (1000000000.0));
00145 
00146       
00147     }
00148 
00149 
00150     /************************* Save the positions and the forces: ***************************/
00151     if (FMB_Info.save){
00152       
00153       if (results_file == NULL){
00154         /* The 'results' filename has not been set yet: */
00155 #define TMP_STRING_LENGTH 10
00156         char step_number_string[TMP_STRING_LENGTH];
00157         int  results_file_length = 0;
00158         
00159         /* Find the relative filename in 'data_file': */
00160         char *rel_data_file = strrchr(data_file, '/') + 1 ; /* find last '/' and go to the next character */
00161         
00162         results_file_length = strlen(RESULTS_DIR) + 
00163           strlen(RESULTS_FILE) + 
00164           strlen(rel_data_file) +  
00165           TMP_STRING_LENGTH + 
00166           1 /* for '\0' */ ; 
00167         
00168         results_file = (char *) FMB_malloc_with_check(results_file_length * sizeof(char));
00169         
00170         strncpy(step_number_string, "", TMP_STRING_LENGTH);
00171         sprintf(step_number_string, "_%lu", nb_steps ); 
00172         
00173         strncpy(results_file, "", results_file_length);
00174         strcpy(results_file, RESULTS_DIR); 
00175         strcat(results_file, RESULTS_FILE); 
00176         strcat(results_file, rel_data_file); 
00177         strcat(results_file, step_number_string); 
00178 #undef TMP_STRING_LENGTH
00179       }
00180       
00181       /* Create directory RESULTS_DIR: */
00182       { struct stat filestat;
00183         if (stat (RESULTS_DIR, &filestat) != 0) {
00184           /* The directory RESULTS_DIR does not exist, we create it: */
00185           mkdir(RESULTS_DIR, 0700); 
00186         }
00187       }
00188 
00189       Direct_method_Dump_bodies(results_file, nb_steps, &bodies);
00190 
00191       FMB_free(results_file);
00192       results_file= NULL ; 
00193       
00194     }
00195 
00196     /************************** Sum of forces and potential: ***************************/
00197     if (FMB_Info.sum){
00198       Direct_method_Sum(NULL, nb_steps, &bodies, total_potential_energy);
00199     }
00200 
00201 
00202 
00203 
00204     tnow+=FMB_Info.dt ; 
00205     nb_steps ++ ; 
00206 
00207   }  /* while ( tnow-FMB_Info.dt <= tend )  */
00208 
00209   /******************************************************************************************/
00210   /********************************** End of the simulation: ********************************/
00211   /******************************************************************************************/
00212 
00213 
00214   Direct_method_Terminate();
00215 
00216 
00217   /********************** Close FILE* and free memory before exiting: ***********************/
00218   if (argc == 3)
00219     if (fclose(f_output) == EOF)
00220       perror("fclose(f_output)");
00221   
00222   FMB_free(data_file);
00223 
00224   /****************************************** EXIT ******************************************/
00225   exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
00226 }

00249 
00250 void usage(){
00251   char mes[300] = "";
00252   
00253   sprintf(mes, "Usage : a.out [-h] %s [-o output_filename] --in[r]=data_filename %s \n"
00254           , "[--soft value]"
00255           , ""
00256           );
00257   
00258   fprintf(stderr, "%s", mes);
00259 
00260 
00261   fprintf(stderr, "\nDescription of the short options:\n"); 
00262 /*   fprintf(stderr, "\t -v \t\t\t Display the version.\n"); */
00263   fprintf(stderr, "\t -h \t\t\t Display this message.\n"); 
00264   fprintf(stderr, "\t -i 'level' \t\t Info display level (0, 1 or 2).\n");
00265   fprintf(stderr, "\t -o 'output_filename' \t Otherwise stdout.\n");
00266 
00267 
00268   fprintf(stderr, "\nDescription of the long options:\n");
00269   fprintf(stderr, "\t --in='filename' \t Input data filename.\n");
00270 
00271   fprintf(stderr, "\t --save \t\t Save position, mass, force and/or potential of all particles.\n");
00272 
00273   /* Unused in this code: */
00274   /*   fprintf(stderr, "\t --out='filename' \t Output data filename for '--save' option.\n"); */
00275 
00276   fprintf(stderr, "\t --sum  \t\t Compute and display the sum of the forces and/or potential over all particles.\n");
00277   fprintf(stderr, "\t --soft='value' \t Softening parameter.\n");
00278   fprintf(stderr, "\t --dt='value' \t\t Leapfrog integration timestep \n");
00279   fprintf(stderr, "\t --tend='value' \t Time to stop integration \n");
00280 
00281   /* We use only NEMO file format in this code: */
00282   /*   fprintf(stderr, "\t --it='value' \t\t input  data format ('fma' for FMB ASCII, 'fmb' for FMB binary, 'nemo').\n"); */
00283   /*   fprintf(stderr, "\t --ot='value' \t\t output data format ('fma' for FMB ASCII, 'fmah' for FMB ASCII human readable, 'fmb' for FMB binary, 'nemo').\n"); */
00284 
00285   fprintf(stderr, "\n");
00286   exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00287 }

00298 /*********************************************************************************************
00299 **********************************************************************************************
00300 
00301    parse_command
00302 
00303 **********************************************************************************************
00304 *********************************************************************************************/
00305 
00306 
00307 /* Long option codes for 'val' field of struct option. 
00308  * Ascii codes 65 -> 90 ('A'->'Z') and 97 -> 122 ('a'->'z') 
00309  * are reserved for short options */
00310 /* Same code as in main.c: */
00311 #define LONGOPT_CODE_SOFT    14
00312 #define LONGOPT_CODE_SAVE    24
00313 #define LONGOPT_CODE_SUM     25
00314 #define LONGOPT_CODE_IT 34
00315 #define LONGOPT_CODE_OT 35
00316 #define LONGOPT_CODE_IN 41
00317 #define LONGOPT_CODE_OUT 43
00318 #define LONGOPT_CODE_DT 49
00319 #define LONGOPT_CODE_TEND 48 
00320 
00321 int parse_command(int argc, 
00322                   char **argv,
00323                   char **p_data_file,
00324                   char **p_results_file){
00325   char options[]="hi:o:";
00326   int curr_opt;
00327   /*   opterr = 0; */
00328 
00329   /* Default values: */
00330   FMB_Info.dt = 0.001;
00331   FMB_Info.tend = 0.001 ; 
00332   FMB_Info.eps_soft = 0.0;
00333 
00334   
00335   struct option longopts[] = {
00336                               {"soft",
00337                                required_argument,
00338                                NULL, 
00339                                LONGOPT_CODE_SOFT},
00340                               {"dt",
00341                                required_argument,
00342                                NULL, 
00343                                LONGOPT_CODE_DT},
00344                               {"tend",
00345                                required_argument,
00346                                NULL, 
00347                                LONGOPT_CODE_TEND},
00348                               {"save",
00349                                no_argument,
00350                                NULL,
00351                                LONGOPT_CODE_SAVE},
00352                               {"sum",
00353                                no_argument,
00354                                NULL, 
00355                                LONGOPT_CODE_SUM},
00356                               {"it",
00357                                required_argument,
00358                                NULL, 
00359                                LONGOPT_CODE_IT},
00360                               {"ot",
00361                                required_argument,
00362                                NULL, 
00363                                LONGOPT_CODE_OT},
00364                               {"in",
00365                                required_argument,
00366                                NULL, 
00367                                LONGOPT_CODE_IN},
00368                               {"out",
00369                                required_argument,
00370                                NULL, 
00371                                LONGOPT_CODE_OUT},
00372                               {0}}; /* last element of the array  */
00373   
00374 
00375   
00376   if (argc == 1){
00377     usage();
00378   }
00379 
00380 
00381   /* Default values: see direct_*/
00382   FMB_Info.eps_soft = 0.0;
00383 
00384   
00385   curr_opt=getopt_long(argc, argv, options, longopts, NULL);
00386   while(curr_opt != (int) EOF){
00387 
00388     switch(curr_opt){
00389     case 'h' : 
00390       usage();
00391       break;
00392     case 'i':
00393       FMB_IO_Info.info_display_level = atoi(optarg);
00394       if (FMB_IO_Info.info_display_level != 0 && 
00395           FMB_IO_Info.info_display_level != 1 &&
00396           FMB_IO_Info.info_display_level != 2 &&
00397           FMB_IO_Info.info_display_level != 3){
00398         FMB_error("Wrong FMB_IO_Info.info_display_level value.\n");
00399       }
00400       break;
00401     case 'o':
00402       if ((f_output = fopen(optarg, "w")) == NULL){
00403         perror("fopen(\'output_filename\', \"w\")");
00404       }   
00405       break;
00406     case '?' : 
00407       usage();
00408       break;
00409 
00410       
00411     case LONGOPT_CODE_SOFT:
00412       FMB_Info.eps_soft = (REAL_T) atof(optarg);
00413       break;
00414     case LONGOPT_CODE_DT:
00415       FMB_Info.dt =(REAL_T) atof(optarg);
00416       break;
00417     case LONGOPT_CODE_TEND:
00418       FMB_Info.tend =(REAL_T) atof(optarg) ; 
00419       break;
00420     case LONGOPT_CODE_SAVE:
00421       FMB_Info.save = TRUE;
00422       break;
00423     case LONGOPT_CODE_SUM:
00424       FMB_Info.sum  = TRUE;
00425       break;      
00426     case LONGOPT_CODE_IT:
00427       if (strcmp(optarg, "fma") == 0){
00428         FMB_IO_Info.input_format = FMB_ASCII_format;
00429       }
00430       else {
00431         if (strcmp(optarg, "fmah") == 0){
00432           FMB_error("FMB_ASCII_human_format is only for \"output format\", not for \"input format\".\n");
00433         } 
00434         else {
00435           if (strcmp(optarg, "fmb") == 0){
00436             FMB_IO_Info.input_format = FMB_binary_format;
00437           }
00438           else {
00439             if ((strcmp(optarg, "nemo") == 0) || (strcmp(optarg, "NEMO"))){
00440               FMB_IO_Info.input_format = NEMO_format;
00441             }
00442             else {
00443               FMB_error("Unknow format for --it option!\n");        
00444             }
00445           }
00446         }
00447       }
00448       FMB_IO_Info.input_format_from_cmd_line = TRUE;
00449       break;
00450     case LONGOPT_CODE_OT:
00451       if (strcmp(optarg, "fma") == 0){
00452         FMB_IO_Info.output_format = FMB_ASCII_format;
00453       }
00454       else {
00455         if (strcmp(optarg, "fmah") == 0){
00456           FMB_IO_Info.output_format = FMB_ASCII_human_format;
00457         }
00458         else {
00459           if (strcmp(optarg, "fmb") == 0){
00460             FMB_IO_Info.output_format = FMB_binary_format;
00461           }
00462           else {
00463             if ((strcmp(optarg, "nemo") == 0) || (strcmp(optarg, "NEMO"))){
00464               FMB_IO_Info.output_format = NEMO_format;
00465             }
00466             else {
00467               FMB_error("Unknow format for --it option!\n");        
00468             }
00469           }
00470         }
00471       }
00472       FMB_IO_Info.output_format_from_cmd_line = TRUE;
00473       break;
00474     case LONGOPT_CODE_IN:
00475       if (*p_data_file != NULL){ FMB_ERROR_BRIEF(); }
00476       *p_data_file = (char *) FMB_malloc_with_check((strlen(optarg) + 1 /* for '\0' */) * sizeof(char));
00477       strcpy(*p_data_file, optarg); 
00478       break;
00479     case LONGOPT_CODE_OUT:
00480       if (*p_results_file != NULL){ FMB_ERROR_BRIEF(); }
00481       *p_results_file = (char *) FMB_malloc_with_check((strlen(optarg) + 1 /* for '\0' */) * sizeof(char));
00482       strcpy(*p_results_file, optarg); 
00483       break;
00484     } /* switch */
00485     curr_opt=getopt_long(argc, argv, options, longopts, NULL);
00486   }
00487 
00488   /* Check that an input data filename has been provided: */
00489   if (*p_data_file == NULL){
00490     FMB_error("No 'input data filename' provided.\n");
00491   }
00492 
00493   return 0;
00494 }
